EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi James, I would be happy to discuss this with you. Please schedule a call on my From: <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS">online schedule. You may also feel free to reach out directly if that is preferred. Looking forward to getting in touch. Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. <span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma","sans-serif";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"> James Saliba [mailto:jsaliba@salibaconsultinggroup.com] Sent: Thursday, March 08, 2012 4:29 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: Lara Ebert Subject: RE: MBO Partners Hello Lara and Sara, I have the opportunity to place 6 to 7 contractors with a client for 6 months. For me to accomplish this I would require MBO services. I do need to get back to my possible client tomorrow on some rough figures so I was hope to have a very quick conversation with you Lara. Then I can follow-up with Sara next week. Regards,Jim Saliba James Saliba President Saliba Consulting Group Inc. 373 Nesconset Hwy. Suite #176 Hauppauge, NY 11788-2516 Office: <tel:%28631%29648-3341">(631)648-3341<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Mobile: <tel:%28631%29463-9509">(631)463-9509<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Fax: <tel:%28631%29780-0228">(631)780-0228<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Skype: jimsaliba <mailto:JSaliba@SalibaConsultingGroup.com">JSaliba@SalibaConsultingGroup.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> <http://www.salibaconsultinggroup.com/" target="_blank">http://www.salibaconsultinggroup.com/<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> <http://www.linkedin.com/in/jamessaliba" target="_blank">http://www.linkedin.com/in/jamessaliba From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>] Sent: Monday, January 09, 2012 10:25 AM To: <mailto:jsaliba@salibaconsultinggroup.com">jsaliba@salibaconsultinggroup.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Cc: Lara Ebert Subject: MBO Partners Dear Jim , I just wanted to follow up on the call you had with Lara Ebert and introudce myself as your point of contact at MBO moving forward. If you have any additonal questions please free to schedule a convenient time for us to speak using my <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS">online schedule.
